## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7a36ee61e0b282cb9e3e623e321b1ea0364f26f8aaf4babbf618a0c61ed0b144)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@google_cloud/common' @ 20.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
